doc:
Belinda Montgomery https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belinda_Montgomery 0 Belinda Montgomery (born July 23, 1950) is a Canadian-American actress, writer, and painter. She initially attracted notice for her starring role in the 1970s science-fiction series Man from Atlantis as Dr. Elizabeth Merrill and for her recurring role as Caroline Crockett/Ballard in the 1980s cop series Miami Vice. However, she is perhaps best known for her role as Katherine Howser, Doogie's mother, in the medical comedy-drama Doogie Howser, M.D.. Belinda_Montgomery ( born July_23_,_1950 ) is a_Canadian-American_actress , writer , and painter . She initially attracted notice for her_starring_role in the_1970s_science-fiction_series_Man from Atlantis as Dr._Elizabeth_Merrill and for her_recurring_role as Caroline_Crockett/Ballard in the_1980s_cop_series_Miami_Vice . However , she is_perhaps_best_known for her_role as Katherine_Howser , Doogie 's_mother , in the_medical_comedy-drama_Doogie_Howser , M.D. .
